Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Aurein 2.6 (natural AMPs; XXA, UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Southern bell frogLitoria aureaorLitoria raniformis, Australia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against B. cereus (MIC 100 ug/ml), E.coli (MIC >100 ug/ml), L. lactis (MIC 6 ug/ml), L. innocua (MIC 100 ug/ml), M. luteus (MIC 25 ug/ml), P.multocida (MIC > 100 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 50 ug/ml), S. epidermidis (MIC 50 ug/ml), and S.uberis (MIC >100 ug/ml) (provided by Chunfeng Wang, validated GW).   C-terminal NH2. Found in multiple species. Updated 9/2017; 7/2021
Literature Information.Author: Rozek T, Wegener KL, Bowie JH, Olver IN, Carver JA, Wallace JC, Tyler MJ.2000, Australia
Literature Information.Title: The antibiotic and anticancer active aurein peptides from the australian bell frogs Litoria aurea and Litoria raniformis the solution structure of aurein 1.2.
